column2: "Nice! I really like what you did with the photon energy. It was so Ranger-like! Beautiful, just beautiful."
"People say Rangers are supposed to stay behind the others. That does make things easier for us, sure."
"But we have what it takes to be the main muscle of any party. Just thinking of how we focus fire on weak points... It gets my blood pumping!"
"Anyway, whatever kind of Ranger you want to be is completely up to you."
"Well, anyhow. Anyhow anyhow. Keep fighting the good fight! Ranger style! With the killing! Lots and lots of the killing!"
